name: Wingate by Wyndham Louisville East

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice, clean place to stay, only complaint is bed is very firm, I prefer a softer bed. Overall this is a great place and I will stay here again if in the area. Breakfast was great. Lady at front desk during check out was not very friendly.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel.
Almost perfect
reviews.text: Very clean hotel - fairly new - great bed and spotless and new bedding. Good pillows. Big room. Good air con.
Breakfast is fine - bacon, sausage, eggs, scrambled egg slices and all the usual.
reviews.title: Not so sure about the high ratings for this hotel ...
Excellent!
reviews.text: Yes, the reception staff let the place down a little, but all in all, excellent.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a nice hotel facility-wise, just like another Wingate we stayed in recently in Atlanta. The room was nice, the place was acceptably clean,and the breakfast was good enough (except there was no decaf available for my wife).
reviews.title: Pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed one night and thought the hotel was very clean and we had no problems. The bed was quite comfortable. Breakfast area is laid out nicely and was your typical motel breakfast. We will stay there again if in the Louisville area.
reviews.title: Nice and clean hotel

reviews.text: When picking hotels to stay at during tournaments I always look to a Wyndham hotel to stay at. This hotel is no exception. I was kindly greeted by the clerk who made my check in smooth and easy. Went I got to my room I found everything I needed and it was very clean. Later that night I called down to the night clerk for a wake up call and to get directions. She was very kind and helpful, she also informed me of a complimentary breakfast that seemed to have a very nice spread.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel even better customer service !!!!!

reviews.text: During the night I noticed a disturbance in the hallway. When I stepped out to see what was happening I noticed a group yelling at the night clerk. I believe pretty girl2's story seems to be a bit out of line. I found every employee in the hotel including desk staff to be extremely nice. I would definately stay again for any tournament needs.
reviews.title: Amazing Stay !!

reviews.text: I consider Wingate as the best hotel to stay in Louisville. The hotel has set very high standards in service, quality, cleanliness and room service.The hotel is new and has best service. I have never seen such a clean property in many years. The service was so great. The rooms are so clean and spacious. It has the best complimentary breakfast without any doubt. The hotel has the best pool and my family spent really a good time. Don't hesitate to make a reservation. It's the best hotel to stay in Louisville.
reviews.title: Decent hotel in a small city

reviews.text: I had neglected to make reservations ahead of time and found that all other hotels in the area were booked solid. Was very glad to get a nice room at the Wingate. Staff was very pleasant and the room was nicely appointed. Unfortunately, there was a previous guest's styrofoam container of take out food in the frig, and it smelled so strongly that it was best left in there. Also, when I turned on the hair dryer the next morning, it made a terrible grinding, clunking sound and died. I was left with wet hair covered in styling product. At the breakfast buffet, the thermos/container for hot water was placed on top of the microwave, so I had to reach up to draw hot water. This could have been disastrous for a shorter person or a child making oatmeal or cocoa. Despite all this, the Wingate was a decent place to stay. Should I travel this route again, I'll check the frig and the hair dryer before I unpack.
reviews.title: Great Location and Spacious Rooms

reviews.text: I called ahead to confirm my room. After driving over 12 hours, I was beat, and the staff made sure my request for a quiet, corner, top-floor room was granted. I slept like a baby due to being tired, BUT! the bed was like a pillow-top. Very comfy! with many pillows to choose from. Clean, stylish, comfortable .... a great hotel for the price of $89.00
reviews.title: Best hotel I have ever stayed at in the past ....

reviews.text: I will recommend and stay again at a Wingate when traveling!! Good job Wingate~
reviews.title: our 6th year

reviews.text: I love the Wingate. We have been staying there for the past 6 years. The only issue I had this year was that it was so much more expensive than previous years. The receptionist stated that during certain weeks when something special is on in Louisville the price is raised!
reviews.title: Wingate-Louisville

reviews.text: The breakfast (complimentary) is really very good.
reviews.title: NQC

reviews.text: Unfortunately, next year I will shop around for competitive rates before booking
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a good hotel with spacious rooms, nice and clean. Good bathroom. Very nice breakfast. Close to restaurants and shops etc. Friendly and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Good hotel at a very fair price

reviews.text: We were in town for my son's wedding and chose this spot due to location and price. They gave us a great group rate!!! Full breakfast in the morning was wonderful. Also, where else can you check in and get your room key then have the clerk pour you a beer??!! Yep, for $2 you could get a beer!
reviews.title: Great Stay at Great Price!!

reviews.text: Beds were very comfortable and the showers were great. Room A/C unit was quiet and did it's job.
reviews.title: Clean, convenient location, fair price, but a few issues

reviews.text: When I go back I will absolutely stay here. They have a new and repeat customer.
reviews.title: A very nice budget hotel

reviews.text: I picked this hotel based on the fact it is a smoke-free hotel and had fairly good reviews. (I stayed 2 nights on March 14-15 2012.) Basic king room for my company corporate travel rate of $85/night.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

aka: Wingate By Wyndham Louisville East Hotel
